title: CT魔改删不掉无尽靴子原合成
author: li2005

replies.author: kongkong7
replies.txt_content:
这样就可以删除 将<Avaritia:Skull_Sword>替换成你需要删除的物品就OK
mods.avaritia.ExtremeCrafting.remove(<Avaritia:Skull_Sword>);

replies.author: li2005
